cab.content: (Received 27th, 10 a.m.)(? Your telegram of l-committee February.) Kkyber Railway. Following from North-West frontier Province, dated 23rd February : " Message has been sent by Sana Gul Malik of Khugiani tribe to all Khugiaiii working on Kliyber Railway. Says that Amir has ordered their immediate return on pain of their houses being burnt. Similar messages have been received by other Afghan tribesmen working on the railway. Many have gone, back and rest are preparing to follow but unwillingly."
